item.title: Post: that thing
item.description: That thing where you’re doing a thing but need to look up something and get an idea and start a thing but need a thing and you notice a thing and get an idea and start a thing and you notice a thing… Is that an card/ADHD thing? That sounds like an ADHD thing.
item.content:encoded:
That thing where you’re doing a thing but need to look up something and get an idea and start a thing but need a thing and you notice a thing and get an idea and start a thing and you notice a thing…

Is that an card/ADHD thing? That sounds like an ADHD thing.

item.title: Post: Saving some links from Perl 6 Weekly
item.description: Haven’t done anything interesting related to card/Raku for years, but I still subscribe to the Perl 6 Weekly blog. Several links caught my eye this week. [!NOTE] Now the Rakudo Weekly Jeff Goff started a fresh series on implementing Template Toolkit in Perl 6. Madeleine Goebel is making great progress on a GSOC project making perl6 produce executable binaries Andrew Shitov wrote a pleasant baby steps sort of intro on using NativeCall for accessing C libraries from Perl 6.
item.content:encoded:
Haven’t done anything interesting related to card/Raku for years, but I still subscribe to the Perl 6 Weekly blog. Several links caught my eye this week.

[!NOTE] Now the Rakudo Weekly

  • Jeff Goff started a fresh series on implementing Template Toolkit in Perl 6.
  • Madeleine Goebel is making great progress on a GSOC project making perl6 produce executable binaries
  • Andrew Shitov wrote a pleasant baby steps sort of intro on using NativeCall for accessing C libraries from Perl 6.
  • Some sort of Chef/Ansible style task runner, called Sparrow6

Anyways, back to work and Python, which is also fun!
